entry.name: style
entry.label: which style is going to be used for the application title/name

entry.name: showIcon
entry.label: show available icon

entry.name: iconFillThickness
entry.label: icon fills applet thickness in order to not look too small in some cases

entry.name: iconSize
entry.label: icon size when fill thickness is not enabled

entry.name: boldFont
entry.label: bold text font

entry.name: italicFont
entry.label: italic text font

entry.name: capitalFont
entry.label: first letter is each word becomes capital

entry.name: lengthFirstMargin
entry.label: first margin used to increase or decrease the icons distance from surrounding applets

entry.name: lengthLastMargin
entry.label: last margin used to increase or decrease the icons distance from surrounding applets

entry.name: lengthMarginsLock
entry.label: used only by the settings window in order to remember the user choice concerning the locker

entry.name: appMenuIsPresent
entry.label: try to identify if appmenu exists in the same containment. This is set only with applets cooperation

entry.name: showAppMenuOnMouseEnter
entry.label: will become hidden in favour of appmenu when the mouse enters the applet

entry.name: sendActivateAppMenuCooperationFromEditMode
entry.label: -1, means sent. 0, means sent false. 1, means sent true

entry.name: spacing
entry.label: spacing between icons

entry.name: showTooltip
entry.label: display tooltip on hover

entry.name: lengthPolicy
entry.label: which length size policy will be applied

entry.name: fixedLength
entry.label: fixed static length when the user shows window title

entry.name: maximumLength
entry.label: maximum length when the user shows window title

entry.name: filterByScreen
entry.label: If true, it shows window information only from the current screen

entry.name: filterActivityInfo
entry.label: If false, it shows only the placeHolder text

entry.name: placeHolder
entry.label: The text shown if nothing else is available

entry.name: formFactor
entry.label: it is used in order to inform settings window about the plasmoid form factor. 2=Horizontal and 3=Vertical

entry.name: containmentType
entry.label: it helps to enable/disable options that are specific to plasma or Latte panels

entry.name: subsMatch
entry.label: substitutions criteria - match for application names

entry.name: subsReplace
entry.label: substitutions replacements for application names

entry.name: actionScrollMinimize
entry.label: If true, upward mouse scrolling cycles through tasks and downwards can be used to minimize them
